description: While roaming the city centre, I met two boys sightseeing. They were both from small towns so trip to Prague was a pretty big thing for them. They were old friends and I couldn´t wait to turn them gay on each other. Just judging by their clothes it was obvious they needed money. Unless you´re a foreign tourist, Prague is not a cheap place to have fun at. And the boys had pretty expensive plans. So it took me only two minutes to make them kiss each other in public. And one more minute to get in their hotel room. Boys were shy as hell but money was way too good. I let them suck each other at first, then I joined them. They had to be really good friends because they went absolutely crazy. It turned me on so much that I couldn´t wait any longer.
title: Czech Hunter 371
